AI Description: DeepTools is a suite of tools for the analysis of high-throughput sequencing data, with a focus on ChIP-seq and ATAC-seq data. It provides various functions for quality control, normalization, visualization, and downstream analysis of sequencing data.
Core Features: Quality Control Of Sequencing Data, Normalization Of Chip-Seq & Atac-Seq Data, Visualization Of Genomic Data, Statistical Analysis Of High-Throughput Sequencing Data
